note:
Cunning Linguist. Comedian. Noted After-Dinner Raconteur. Bit of a Pillock.

He/him, slightly left of Castro, BLM, trans rights are human rights, passionate about verbally dickpunching fascists.

Halfway decent home chef, voracious reader, devout geek with far too many geeky tattoos and collectibles for a man of his age, enthusiastic traveller, motorcyclist and eventually organ donor.
